arts.ttl: Arsenal and Tottenham on High Alert as Real Madrid Sends Scout to Monitor PSG-Linked Stars
arts.sum: In recent days, Paris Saint-Germain has been linked to two center-backs, Tottenham Hotspur’s Cristian Romero and Arsenal’s William Saliba, to bolster its defense. However, the French giants aren’t alone in this interest. Real Madrid has also been linked to those players. Moreover, the LaLiga side might be taking an extra step over PSG. arts.ttl: PSG Beat Liverpool to Sign Player Who ‘Fits Perfectly’ into Their Style, Antwerp Star Says
arts.sum: Over the summer, Paris Saint-Germain secured Willian Pacho from Eintracht Frankfurt to bolster their center-back position. Now, a few games into the 2024-25 season, one current player praises the Parisians for landing the Ecuadorian. arts.ttl: ‘Similar Vibes’ – Expert Skeptical About Former Chelsea, PSG Manager Having Success as USMNT Boss
arts.sum: Former Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain manager Mauricio Pochettino is making a big career move, stepping away from club football to take charge of the United States national team. arts.ttl: ‘Creates the Out’ – Real Madrid Star Odd Man Out Expert Believes; Liverpool, PSG Possible Destinations
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé is playing the No. 9 role at Real Madrid this early in the 2024-25 season. arts.sum: During Kylian Mbappé’s time at Paris Saint-Germain, he was frequently linked to Real Madrid, but Liverpool was another club that occasionally surfaced in connection to the French star. arts.ttl: Liverpool’s Looming Free Agent Move Ahead of PSG Star on Real Madrid’s RB Wishlist
arts.sum: Earlier this summer, Mario Cortegana of The Athletic reported that Real Madrid have been eyeing Achraf Hakimi as a potential long-term replacement for Dani Carvajal. However, this move may not materialize. arts.sum: After giving up an early penalty to Stade Brestois, Paris Saint-Germain bounced back with three straight goals, including a brace from Ousmane Dembélé. arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | PSG 3-1 Brest: Ousmane Dembélé and Fabián Ruiz make it four wins in four for league leaders
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 4, 14/09/24 Paris Saint-Germain came from behind at the Parc des Princes to defeat Stade Brestois 3-1 and maintain their unbeaten start to the season. PSG…
